name: 3ort Inženjering
description: 3ort inženjering was founded in August 2003. It comprises a group of electrical engineers experienced in research and development in the areas of software design, implementation, testing, and software quality assurance. 3ort inženjering is specialized in developing custom enterprise applications based on the unified process iterative development and Scrum agile framework, bringing efficiency to service for their clients.
